resources.string:
Version: 1.5

ChangeLog:
  • 1.5 Add turn-on screen plugin, free the power button.
    USAGE: Keep flat in portrait direction, then pick it up and turn it in font of you(about 60 degree), then screen will turn on automatically

  • 1.4 Add one custom slot, support all android devices in non-root mode

  • 1.3 Fix icon label display issue

  • 1.2 Add audio volume control

  • 1.1 Add support for non-rooted Galaxy-Tab2 series device

  • 1.0 Support lock and shutdown Galaxy-Tab2 series device


Donate:
This application is free, if you like it, please support by click the Ads(better when connected by wifi), thanks a lot for your support!
